backend/main.mo: Stores messages keyed by caller principal and provides submit, get by id, and list-all APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing an icon-style update tied to HomeCategoriesGrid.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to short functional summaries.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base layer with CSS variables for themes, dark mode values, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root mount element and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all main pages wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedSto: Carousel component that cycles through featured stories with navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeCategor: Grid of predefined categories using solid custom SVG icons with luxury black‑and‑white styling.
frontend/src/components/home/LuxuryFeatu: Styled story card showing metadata, excerpt, and link to detail page with luxury theme effects.
frontend/src/components/home/NewsletterS: Newsletter signup strip with email input, subscription state, and success message UI.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with branding, quick links, optional social links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Implements the site header with navigation, login/signup buttons, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the page with a header, footer, and main Outlet region.
frontend/src/components/stories/StoryCar: Displays a story preview card showing category, date, title, excerpt, tags, and a Read More link.
frontend/src/data/stories.ts: Defines the Story interface and exports a list of example story objects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactSubmit.ts: Provides contact form submission logic using the backend actor with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, handling authentication, stored identities, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a query hook to fetch all messages from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStoriesFilter.ts: Filters stories by category and search query using memoization.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus base typography and utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, values, and platform description using styled sections and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission handling, and contact details display.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with a hero section, featured stories, and category navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a login interface using Internet Identity with redirect logic and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Shows the site's privacy policy with sections describing data collection and usage.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Signup page handling Internet Identity login, redirecting on success, and showing authenticated or signup UI states.
frontend/src/pages/StoriesPage.tsx: Stories listing page with search, category filtering, active filter badges, and a responsive story grid.
frontend/src/pages/StoryDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single story’s details with category, tags, metadata, body content, and navigation back to the stories list.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Static Terms & Conditions page rendered inside a card layout with multiple policy sections.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing design direction, routes, homepage refinement tasks, and known content inconsistencies.
